thread.title: Bieber drops new single 'Sorry'

title: Bieber drops new single 'Sorry'
text: Bieber drops new single 'Sorry' Friday, 23 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) , Oct.23 (ANI): Justin Bieber has surely made the day of his fans by dropping his new single 'Sorry' on social media. Justin Bieber Asks for Forgiveness in New Song 00:49 Justin Bieber is looking for a second chance from everyone. The latest stop on the pop star's apology tour leading up to his upcoming album Purpose is his latest single "Sorry," and Bieber released a "dance video" for the track on Thursday. The video itself shows no sign of the pop star. Instead, it... Recent related news Justin Bieber's new single "Sorry" is finally out with a dance-filled video. Indian Express 2 hours ago - Entertainment The upbeat track was premiered on radio a day ahead of its official October 23 release before arriving online along with the video. AceShowbiz 8 hours ago - Entertainment Tori Kelly has just dropped her brand new song “Hollow” and you can listen to the full track right here! “‘Hollow,’ for me, is very directly connected... Just Jared Jr 9 hours ago - Entertainment If Justin Bieber's comeback wasn't dipped in gold, it certainly is now. The singer just dropped the music video for "Sorry" on Twitter a day earlier than... E! Online 10 hours ago - Entertainment Sorry we're not sorry for writing about this catchy new jam. Entertainment Tonight 11 hours ago - Celebrities Justin Bieber has nothing to be Sorry for! The What Do You Mean singer finally dropped his new single on Thursday afternoon, and he did it in the form a dance... Perez Hilton 13 hours ago - Celebrities Also reported by • Billboard.com • Mashable • WebProNews Check our your first listen of Justin Bieber‘s brand new song “Sorry”!
